de.ovgu.featureide.migration.impl

Class SPLMigrationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.migration.impl.SPLMigrationUtils

  • public class SPLMigrationUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements methods that might be useful in Migrating a Set of Projects into a FeatureIDE Project. Currently this is only implemented for the FeatureHouse composer in VariantsToFeatureHouseSPLMigrator.
    Author:
    Konstantin Tonscheidt, Marcus Pinnecke
